With school restarted now, we would like to announce a couple changes starting tomorrow 09/10/2020.

In an effort to improve the safety of our students and their parents walking to and from school, we have decided to add a new crossing post to the intersection of W. Sylvania Ave and Pond Road. While doing so we have also eliminated the crossing guard post at Highway 35 and 3rd Ave, as the intersection is controlled by a traffic light, has a pedestrian crossing sign, and has shown a considerable decrease of pedestrian traffic every year.

We wanted to take the time to also THANK our amazing Crossing Guards for their tireless efforts, no matter the weather, and their concerns for the safety of our children over the years.
